segments.text: Solomon , I thought we had agreed to change this deadline .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wanted to talk to you about that , Mr . Eng . Mr . Emory would prefer to keep the deadline as is . We can start earlier if you ’ d like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll have to think about that , Ms . Solomon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , sir . We can wait another day or two .
segments.speaker: S2
